Text: Many thanks for this critical upload. Merrill Goozner in some respects doesn't go far enough. This scam by the drug companies dates back to at least the 60s. I can recall reading through some White Papers back then detailing this crap, and it has just gotten worse and worse.

I upped this three years ago, promised to re-up it soon and then promptly forgot about it.
